name: BONES 206/7
description:
A dungeon/puzzle game designed with retro style.

Story:

In this game you are a powerful and immortal skeleton lord. Some intruders came to your dungeon and they tried to loot your treasury. You have awaken and you will not let this happen. Your main goal is getting rid of these thieves. And after you accomplish this goal, you will get to the ground with your lovely dragon.

Game Content:

This game contains different puzzle mechanics (e.g time based challenges), unique retro art style, and some music/sound effects.

The game also contains an extra mission that you must collect enough amount of golds to complete the mission. While collecting the golds, you have to avoid the falling rocks.

Team and Development Process:

We are a team with 4 students which work on different areas;

- Baran INCE

- Ismet KILINC

- M. Enes UNAL

- Ogehan Gucay GUL

We developed this game on Unity with our own scripts, drawings, and some free assets.

This game created for Lost Cartridge Jam 2021 in 72 hours.
